comments.author: Jirayu.5834
comments.body:
currently on match reset. (like latest 18:00 UTC) when you get score from API. you will able to get final score (like for a short period before match start) but all info about KDR reset to 0 like in attachment

This make it real hard to track KDR precisely.

It would be great if you can provide KDR on match reset just like final warscore
